title: Betaine improves appetite regulation and glucose-lipid metabolism in mandarin fish (Siniperca chuatsi) fed a high-carbohydrate-diet by regulating the AMPK/mTOR signaling
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Hongyan Li, Yanzhi Zeng, Guangjun Wang, Kai Zhang, Wangbao Gong, Zhifei Li, Jingjing Tian, Yun Xia, Wenping Xie, Jun Xie, Shouqi Xie, Ermeng Yu
